name: Ace Solitaire for card
description:
Here is a great game featured by its simple play arts and wonderful effects!

This solitaire is programmed with utmost careful for your leisure time. With it, you can gain tons of joy easily and surprisingly!

This game is highly user-friendly with a beautiful and clean interface. You can better control your schedule by the current time displayed on the interface.

Move over, several gorgeous background images are available for you. You are free to choose your favorite!
